detectors.description: arShield.mint(uint256,address) (arShield.sol#356-390) ignores return value by pToken.transferFrom(user,address(this),_pAmount) (arShield.sol#375)
arShield.withdrawExcess(address) (arShield.sol#845-853) ignores return value by IERC20(_token).transfer(beneficiary,IERC20(_token).balanceOf(address(this))) (arShield.sol#851)
arShield.withdraw(address) (arShield.sol#496-504) ignores return value by pToken.transfer(_user,balance) (arShield.sol#503)
arShield.redeem(uint256,address) (arShield.sol#401-427) ignores return value by arToken.transferFrom(user,address(this),_arAmount) (arShield.sol#409)
arShield.redeem(uint256,address) (arShield.sol#401-427) ignores return value by pToken.transfer(user,pAmount - fee) (arShield.sol#419)
arShield.liquidate(uint256) (arShield.sol#437-466) ignores return value by pToken.transfer(msg.sender,tokensOut) (arShield.sol#465)

arShield.arValue(uint256) (arShield.sol#535-550) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- balance == 0 (arShield.sol#545)

Reentrancy in arShield.redeem(uint256,address) (arShield.sol#401-427):
	External calls:
	- arToken.transferFrom(user,address(this),_arAmount) (arShield.sol#409)
	- arToken.burn(_arAmount) (arShield.sol#410)
	- pToken.transfer(user,pAmount - fee) (arShield.sol#419)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _saveFees(newFees,_referrer,refFee) (arShield.sol#420)
		- feesToLiq[i] = liqFees[i] (arShield.sol#779)
	- _saveFees(newFees,_referrer,refFee) (arShield.sol#420)
		- refTotal += _refFee (arShield.sol#776)
